Name: The Savant
Text: Exile The Savant: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

Name: The Tyrant
Text: Exile The Tyrant: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

Name: The General
Text: Exile The General: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.

Name: The Explorer
Text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

Name: The Provider
Text: Exile The Provider: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

Name: The Warmonger
Text: Exile The Warmonger: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.

Name: The Vanquisher
Text: Your starting hand size is increased by one.\nYour maximum hand size is increased by one.
